name: Dice Defence
description:
How To Play

Objective: Destroy as many red dices as you can before they destroy your Castle

  1. Once per turn, one or more red dices will spawn at the end of the board. Use your own dices to attack the enemy's ones
  2. Click on the dice you want to use to attack, then select the enemy dice. You can use more than one dice to attack the same objective, and one dice can attack more than one objective.
  3. To win a battle, the sum of all dices you used, must be equal or higher than the sum of the  enemy's dices
  4. If you win, you can keep the enemy's dice, but it doesn't matter if you win or you lose, you will always lose the dice you use in a battle
  5. If you win a battle with the exact number the enemy has (Example: Win a 6 with a 6), you will get twice the dices
